title: Customer Satisfaction Survey for EV Charger Provider
description: We appreciate your feedback! Please take a few minutes to answer the following questions.

questions.question: How satisfied are you with our service?
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's satisfaction by looking at the 'TotalCost' column, which reflects the cost incurred during each session. If the total cost is low, it may indicate that the customer is satisfied with the service.

questions.question: Which of the following charging behaviors do you exhibit most frequently?
options: I don't charge my vehicle at this location
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's charging behavior by looking at the 'transaction_start' column and identifying peak and off-peak hours.

questions.question: Rate your preferred time to charge your vehicle:
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's preferred charging time by looking at the 'transaction_start' column and identifying patterns in charging behavior.

questions.question: Rate your preferred unplug time:
questions.data_driven_method_description: Based on the available dataset, we can analyze the customer's preferred unplug time by looking at the 'transaction_end' column and identifying patterns in charging behavior.

questions.question: What can we do to improve your experience?
